review: I love it.Doesn't have a lot of free apps that I'd enjoy. But if you're a big binge watcher then this is great. Don't have to worry about a box or anything just a little thing that sticks in in your HDMI spot on the tv.I love NETFLIX & HULU PLUS, so this was definitely the device for me :) & plus I love pandora on my tv and having access to YouTube and things like that!!
